Vesir < Puzur πzar

𒅤𒊭𒀭𒈠𒈠 Puzur

𒀭𒌋𒌋 𒀭𒉽 Azur Mazda see Mars ≈ 𜑰𜎐𜎅 Šimut 𒀭♂ •Sir Martʰ

Vesir Æsir असुर asura Ahura

وَزَرَ wazara, “to carry, to shoulder” (Wässerer / wasser-träger)
wizīr, “decision, judgment”
𐬬𐬍𐬗𐬌𐬭𐬀 vīcira, “arbitrator, judge”

𓊩𓁹 vizier Wesir …Seher وَزِير wazīr < Quasir > Osiris 𓊩𓁹 Horseye 𓂀 𓊨𓁹𓀭 vs 𓁹𓊨𓀭 Master :

𓄈 Merkur ☿ Merker ⇔
𓄊 Wesir/Wisser/Wealther 𓄊 𓋴 𓂋 𓀀 wealthy man < usher 𓅱 𓄊 𓋴 𓂋 Assur < bosser Poser Potentat

𒂗𒆠 Merkur/Malik

𒂗 earl < Ba'al < Basileo > bossir vesir > Ensi® [𓇩]] ⋍ 𒅔𒋛 𓆥 ⇔ 𓊹
